Package com.lutw.reports.controller

Class TemplateController

java.lang.Object
com.lutw.reports.controller.TemplateController
@Controller
public class TemplateController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class for the form template page that manages requests related to creating and updating form template questions

    • addQuestionTypes

      @ModelAttribute public void addQuestionTypes​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method that adds the list of question types to the model on each request
      Parameters:
      model - Model object that holds attributes for the view

    • getTemplateView

      @GetMapping("/templates") public java.lang.String getTemplateView​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get mapping for the templates endpoing that returns the view for the Form template viewer/editor
      Parameters:
      model - Model object that holds attributes for the view
      Returns:
      name of the template viewer/editor view

    • saveTemplate

      @PostMapping("/templates") public java.lang.String saveTemplate​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, TemplateDto template)
      Post mapping for the templates endpoints that overwrites the current form template from a mapped form submission
      Parameters:
      model - Model object that holds attributes for the view
      template - the mapped form submission holding the new questions
      Returns:
      redirect to the template viewer/editor view

    • getQuestions

      @GetMapping("/api/questions") @ResponseBody public TemplateDto getQuestions()
      Get mapping at api/questions that returns a form template object holding a list of all questions assigned to that template
      Returns:
      a form template object holding a list of questions in JSON

    • postQuestions

      @RequestMapping(value="/api/questions", method=POST, consumes="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postQuestions​(@RequestBody TemplateDto template)
      Post mapping at api/questions that accepts a template holding a list of questions and updates that template in the database
      Parameters:
      template - the template object holding the updated questions
      Returns:
      HttpStatus.OK if the update was successful
